title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin taking the day off, Joy Taylor steps in to discuss the Brian Flores lawsuit and why the Giants fell short in the written response to the allegations. She officially gives up on the Dallas Cowboys as a legitimate championship organization in the NFL. She also explains why she believes Jim Harbaugh is telling the truth about wanting to return to Michigan, for now. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to give his thoughts on what makes each of the QBs special in the Super Bowl between the Bengals and the Rams. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
